channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope Francis Is Hospitalized for Bronchitis
item.description: The 88-year-old pontiff, who has been battling health problems for years, is expected to remain hospitalized in Rome, the Vatican said.

item.title: Gen Z is rejecting Boomer work rules in 5 key ways that will help them win at work
item.description: Young workers are ‘cheating’ at work, setting work-life boundaries, and prioritizing their mental health.

item.title: Kendrick Lamar’s Halftime Show Was Political Art, if You Knew Where to Look
item.description: With an audience of over 120 million people, Kendrick’s show broke viewership records. But at times it seemed designed to speak directly to me.

item.title: Larry Ellison wants the U.S. to ‘unify all the national data’ and then feed it to AI
item.description: Ellison is a Republican donor and friends with Trump’s federal cost-cutter Elon Musk.

item.title: Remnants of a Roman Basilica Are Found Under a London Office Building
item.description: The 2,000-year-old basilica was “once the beating heart of Roman London,” the Museum of London Archaeology said.

item.title: China Says U.S. Should Lead Trump’s Proposed Arms Controls Push
item.description: President Trump said China and Russia should halve their military spending and limit nuclear weapons. You first, China said.
